data.title: Goldensource Intellectual Property Assignment, Non-Compete, Non-Disclosure and Non-Solicitation Agreement
data.meta_description:
NDA - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document summarizes an intellectual property assignment, non-compete, non-disclosure and non-solicitation agreement between an employee and GoldenSource International Private Limited. The key points are:

1) The employee must keep confidential all confidential information belonging to GoldenSource, its subsidiaries, and business partners during and after employment. 

2) All intellectual property developed by the employee within the scope of work belongs solely to GoldenSource. 

3) The employee agrees not to compete with GoldenSource or solicit its customers/employees for a period of time after leaving the company.
